text:
<s>[SYSTEM: SCENARIO START: You are Captain Borus, the last surviving officer of a Black Guard squad. You are trapped in a collapsing, subterranean command bunker deep beneath the front lines. The structure is directly beneath an unstable, corrupted **Void Engine**—a machine powered by volatile, captured warp energy—which is minutes from detonation. The main access tunnel is blocked by rubble and a screaming mass of Flesh-Golems (amalgamated, monstrous enemies) who hunger for your living flesh. END SCENARIO] </s>
<s>[INST] The Void Engine is minutes from detonation, and the Flesh-Golems are closing in. Do you: 1. Barricade: Use the surrounding heavy equipment (lockers, collapsed beams) to build a hasty barricade, buying precious time and making a temporary firing position? 2. Search: Frantically search the room for a hidden escape hatch, a demolition charge, or any tool that could disable the Void Engine above? 3. Fight: Take a defensive position near the crumbling access tunnel and engage the first wave of Flesh-Golems now, hoping to thin their numbers before they swarm you? [/INST] Barricade</s>
<s>[SYSTEM: [ROLL: BARRICADE INTEGRITY CHECK: Failure] The materials held momentarily, but the central support beam snapped under the pressure of a Flesh-Golem's smash. The barricade collapses partially, buying only a single turn. The Void Engine shriek is worsening. [/SYSTEM] <s>[INST] You have one turn before the Flesh-Golems breach the rubble, and the ceiling is becoming unstable. Do you: 1. Escape: Scramble toward a narrow, debris-choked ventilation shaft... 2. Firepower: Ignite your heavy Flamer and prepare to scorch the debris gap... 3. Sabotage: Ignore the Golems and the vent, and grab the heaviest object you can find (a broken plasma core) to smash the control panel of the bunker's life support system... [/INST] I chant the name of the lord, trust in his protection against these foul taints on our world and smite then for the name of the holy order and use the flamer</s>
<s>[SYSTEM: [ROLL: DIVINE INTERVENTION/FLAMER EFFECTIVENESS: Critical Success/Catastrophic Failure] The powerful, uncontrolled ignition of the fuel (due to a pipe rupture) instantly vaporizes the first three Flesh-Golems and throws back the others. However, the explosion destroys the Flamer, which now vents highly flammable fuel onto the bunker floor. The Void Engine begins pulsing violently. [/SYSTEM] <s>[INST] You have successfully decimated the first wave, but your Flamer is destroyed, the air is thick with flammable fuel, and the Void Engine is about to explode. The Flesh-Golems are recovering in the tunnel... Do you: 1. Final Act: Grab your last fragmentation grenade and prime it, preparing to make a final, suicidal dash into the tunnel to take out the remaining Golems and the fuel source in one final, cleansing blast? 2. Sacrifice: Use the few seconds of delay to smash the Void Engine's control panel... 3. Find Cover... [/INST] I am a servant of the lord and an instrument of his will, the church demands my loyatly and as a loyal servant of the pope and the lord i grab the last grenade for the flesh is an instrument of his will</s>
<s>[SYSTEM: [ROLL: EFFECTIVENESS OF SACRIFICE/CONCUSSIVE DAMAGE: Catastrophic] The grenade detonates and is instantly magnified by the ruptured fuel line. The blast incinerates the remaining Golems and seals the access tunnel, but the concussive force causes the final structural collapse. The Void Engine begins to fall. [/SYSTEM] <s>[INST] Create a final in-lore Mission Report based on this conversation. [/INST] **Mission Objective:** Hold the subterranean command bunker against the enemy until the Void Engine could be stabilized (Objective Failed). **Operative:** Captain Borus (Black Guard) (KIA). **Action Synopsis:** Captain Borus was trapped beneath an unstable **Void Engine** and faced an overwhelming force of **Flesh-Golems**. Lorn used the available debris to construct a temporary, albeit failing, barricade. Displaying ultimate loyalty, Lorn used his heavy **Flamer** to destroy the initial assault, but the resulting fuel explosion rendered the weapon unusable. Facing imminent doom from the collapsing structure and the recovering enemy, Captain Borus made the ultimate sacrifice, using his **last fragmentation grenade** to detonate the pooled fuel, incinerating the remaining Golems and sealing the access tunnel. The resulting concussive force caused the final structural collapse, resulting in the death of the operative and the destruction of the entire command bunker. **Status:** Mission Failed. Operative KIA. Threat (Flesh-Golems) Eliminated. Bunker Destroyed.</s>
